returns._0: The address of the deployment. May be `address(0)` if the deployment does not         exist.
Whether the deployment exists or not.

params._addr: The mock address of the deployment.

archivePreviousOpChainFaucetsDrippieConf.notice: Archives the previous OP Chain drip configs.

get(string).notice: Returns a deployment that is suitable to be used to interact with contracts.

getAddress(string).notice: Returns the address of a deployment. Also handles the predeploys.

has(string).notice: Returns whether or not a particular deployment exists.

installFaucetAdminDripV1().notice: Installs the FaucetAdminDripV1 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetAuthModulesConfigs().notice: Installs all of the auth modules in the faucet contract.

installFaucetDripV1().notice: Installs the FaucetDripV1 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetDripV2().notice: Installs the FaucetDripV2 drip on the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetDrippieConfigs().notice: Installs the drip configs in the faucet drippie contract.

installFaucetGelatoBalanceV2().notice: Installs the GelatoBalanceV2 drip on the faucet drippie contract.
